title: Water glass, from a set of four
text: These glasses comprise one of several table settings owned by William and Mathilda Wilkins and used with the adjacent celery vase at Homewood, the Wilkins' country estate near Pittsburgh.
description: stemmed glass; radiating design on bottom of foot; thick band cut with hatched diamonds with vertical ribs above; clear
creditline: Gift of funds from various donors, by exchange, and Gift of Bobbie Hainline Howrey
